dct_alternative_sm: Map of San Francisco, Cal. / compiled from the official map and most recent surveys. Published by Nathaniel Gray, 112 Montgomery street. Lith of B.F. Butler.
dct_description_sm: North is oriented towards the lower right.
Includes index of local landmarks, important buildings, and churches.
"Entered according to an Act of Congress in the year 1854 by B.F. Butler in the Clerks Office of the District Court of the Northern District of Claifornia."
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
